# Question 1
## Part 1
```{r}
simulate_normal <- function(sample_size){
  samples <- rnorm(sample_size, mean = 0, sd = 1)
  sample_mean <- mean(samples)
  diff <- abs(sample_mean)
  return(diff)
}
sample_sizes <- seq(10, 1000, by = 5)
differences <- sapply(sample_sizes, simulate_normal)

scatterplot <- ggplot() + 
  geom_point(aes(x = sample_sizes, y = differences), color = 'blue', alpha = 0.5)+
  labs(x = 'Sample size', y = 'Absolute difference', title = 'Correlation between sample size and absolute difference')

print(scatterplot)

```
